roleset.name: sell sex for money (or metaphorical extension thereof)
roleset.note: PROSTITUTE-V NOTES: hand-checked by Kevin (from prostitute.01-v)

role.descr: thing being prostituted (e.g., oneself, one's body, etc.)

example.name: prostitute-v: regular usage
example.text: He prostituted himself for money to buy drugs.

example.name: prostitution-n
example.text: Her "prostitution" of identity constituted a cunning gambit for self-advancement.
